name: Chemo Quest
description:
!! FULLSCREEN WEB VERSION !!

If you can, download the game, as the downloaded version plays better, But the web version functions as well, as long as you fullscreen the game.

Frostbit is our team name.

Controls and rules:

Hold WASD to shoot

Grab health packs to heal 

kill all enemies in a level to win

If you run out of health, you die

Chemo Quest is a fast and difficult bullet hell that has you as a cell defeating the leukemia that infected your body! Use your mouse to move around, and the WASD keys to shoot bullets!

Credits:

Caden Stefanelli (Cheesecat) - Code, music, and some sfx

Ethan Malmstrom - Code and sfx

Duckatrops - Artwork
